Condor::

"If you like, Rodimus"said Condor "I could fly over their bases... 
who knows? perhaps I can see something..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> "Right now, Condor, I'd like to monitor the Predacon's actions. 
Whenever this Pred/Tripred battle breaks out I want to know whats 
happaning."
> 
> Rodimus' computer picks up the signal from Windlord's pod.
> 
> Rodimus opens a comm to Ragnar.
> 
> "Ragnar, it seems that I do have something you could do. It seems 
we are picking up a homing signal from a Maximal pod. Track it down. 
If you find Maximals, bring them back. Be careful though, it could be 
a trick."
> 
> Rodimus send the pod's signal to Ragnar.
